alert.note: Alert for Delta; Hopkins; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 4:59PM CDT until April 20 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hopkins County in north central Texas... Central Delta County in north central Texas... Southeastern Lamar County in north central Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 458 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Hagansport, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cooper, Big Creek Lake, Cooper Lake State Park, Pattonville, Cooper Lake, Klondike, Deport, Tira, New Birthright, Pacio, Minter, Biardstown, Taylor Town, Nelta, Clardy, Milton, Cunningham, Gadston and Peerless. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
